name: Keyboard Ghosting
description:
Keyboard Ghosting is a 3D puzzle game where your options for movement are limited as you attempt to move from room to room.

Your goal - obtain the key and open the final door.

The catch - your range of motion is always limited!

  • Standing under temples allows you to choose your range of motion (up/down/jump etc.)
  • Each temple grants you between one to three movements of your choice.
  • Between temples, you can only use the movements chosen at last temple visited!
  • To reset/change your range of motion, you must reach another temple.

With a limited range of motion and a limited amount of ways to reset your allowed movements, you must strategize to get the keys needed to reach the final door. 

You might run out of controls and get stuck- so think ahead and choose wisely!

 

Instructions
  •  WASD or Arrows to Move
  •  Q or L-CTRL to Jump
